entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
